snippet.title: Metrogether Demo Release & Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the Demo NOW: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3239770/Metrogether_Train_Simulator/

Metrogether is a train simulator where you drive, collect passengers, work together with friends and explore the subway network in a fictional city. Embark on your journey as a train driver or ticket inspector in single and multiplayer.
